Package mediator

Class RmiServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • mediator.RmiServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, RemoteModel
    public class RmiServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements RemoteModel
    Connected to by the RmiClient class to establish the Client - Server relationship
    Version:
    0.5 5/23/22
    Author:
    Chris, Martin, Levente, Kruno

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RmiServer()
      Creates new GameList and RmiServer object, Model interface and starts the Server

      • RmiServer

        public RmiServer()
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                 java.net.MalformedURLException,
                 java.sql.SQLException
        Creates new GameList and RmiServer object, Model interface and starts the Server
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - when there is an issue with the connection with the client
        java.net.MalformedURLException - when stub is unsuccessfully created
        java.sql.SQLException - database errors

      • leaveReview

        public void leaveReview​(int review,
                        Game game)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Leave a review between 1 and 5 rating the game the user has rented. The average review score can then be seen by users browsing the available games.
        Specified by:
        leaveReview in interface RemoteModel
        Parameters:
        review - The integer between 1 and 5 rating the experience. 1 is the worst and 5 is the best.
        game - The game that the review relates to
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown when an issue occurs with the remote model

      • getReview

        public float getReview​(Game game)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets the cumulative average of the review scores for a game.
        Specified by:
        getReview in interface RemoteModel
        Parameters:
        game - The game for which the reviews relate to
        Returns:
        A float with the average review between 1.0 and 5.0
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown when an issue occurs with the remote model

      • returnGame

        public void returnGame​(Game game,
                       User user)
